item.title: Help with client dcing- just look its prolly easy question
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

k so whever i try to log in on my server it dcs me like right away so ive been told from bluurr to do this

Quote from bluurr—

Add this to your server

open player.java

add

Code:
public int skulls = 0;
public int hint = 0;

find

Code:
playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

make it look like

Code:
playerProps.writeByte(skulls);
playerProps.writeByte(hint);
playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

But i dont get where to add the first part so some help please. It says in player.java but where in player.java?

Read full topic
